*** END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ***
 
IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SOFTWARE.
 
1. LICENSE
 
By receiving, opening the file package, and/or using FüD5 ("Software") containing this software, you agree that this End User License Agreement (EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
 
Unless you have a different license agreement signed by Team FüD5 your use of FüD5 indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty.

Subject to the terms of this Agreement, Team FüD5 grants to you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license, without right to sub-license, to use FüD5 in accordance with this Agreement and any other written agreement with Team FüD5. Team FüD5 does not transfer the title of FüD5 to you; the license granted to you is not a sale. This agreement is a binding legal agreement between Team FüD5 and the purchasers or users of FüD5.
 
If you do not agree to be bound by this agreement, remove FüD5 from your computer now and, if applicable, promptly return to Team FüD5 by mail any copies of FüD5 and related documentation and packaging in your possession.
 
2. DISTRIBUTION

FüD5 and the license herein granted shall not be copied, shared, distributed, re-sold, offered for re-sale, transferred or sub-licensed in whole or in part except that you may make one copy for archive purposes only. For information about redistribution of FüD5 contact Team FüD5.
 
3. USER AGREEMENT
 
3.1 Use
 
Your license to use FüD5 is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of FüD5.
 
3.2 Use Restrictions
 
You shall use FüD5 in compliance with all applicable laws and not for any unlawful purpose. Without limiting the foregoing, use, display or distribution of FüD5 together with material that is pornographic, racist, vulgar, obscene, defamatory, libelous, abusive, promoting hatred, discriminating or displaying prejudice based on religion, ethnic heritage, race, sexual orientation or age is strictly prohibited.
 
Each licensed copy of FüD5 may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of FüD5 means that you have loaded, installed, or run FüD5 on a computer or similar device. If you install FüD5 onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of FüD5 must be licensed separately.
 
You may make one copy of FüD5 for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of FüD5 . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of FüD5 are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of Team FüD5. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of FüD5. If any person other than yourself uses FüD5 registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!
 
3.3 Copyright Restriction
 
This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile FüD5. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from FüD5 in whole or in part.
 
Team FüD5's name, logo and graphics file that represents FüD5 shall not be used in any way to promote products developed with FüD5 . Team FüD5 retains sole and exclusive ownership of all right, title and interest in and to FüD5 and all Intellectual Property rights relating thereto.
 
Copyright law and international copyright treaty provisions protect all parts of FüD5, products and services. No program, code, part, image, audio sample, or text may be copied or used in any way by the user except as intended within the bounds of the single user program. All rights not expressly granted hereunder are reserved for Team FüD5.

3.4 Limitation of Responsibility
 
You will indemnify, hold harmless, and defend Team FüD5 , its employees, agents and distributors against any and all claims, proceedings, demand and costs resulting from or in any way connected with your use of Team FüD5's Software.
 
In no event (including, without limitation, in the event of negligence) will Team FüD5 , its employees, agents or distributors be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect, special or punitive damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, loss of use, business interruption, loss of information or data, or pecuniary loss), in connection with or arising out of or related to this Agreement, FüD5 or the use or inability to use FüD5 or the furnishing, performance or use of any other matters hereunder whether based upon contract, tort or any other theory including negligence.
 
Team FüD5's entire liability, without exception, is limited to the customers' reimbursement of the purchase price of the Software (maximum being the lesser of the amount paid by you and the suggested retail price as listed by Team FüD5 ) in exchange for the return of the product, all copies, registration papers and manuals, and all materials that constitute a transfer of license from the customer back to Team FüD5.
 
3.5 Warranties
 
Except as expressly stated in writing, Team FüD5 makes no representation or warranties in respect of this Software and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose.
 
3.6 Governing Law
 
This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the United States applicable therein. You hereby irrevocably attorn and submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of United States therefrom. If any provision shall be considered unlawful, void or otherwise unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from this License and not affect the validity and enforceability of any other provisions.
 
3.7 Termination
 
Any failure to comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement will result in automatic and immediate termination of this license. Upon termination of this license granted herein for any reason, you agree to immediately cease use of FüD5 and destroy all copies of FüD5 supplied under this Agreement. The financial obligations incurred by you shall survive the expiration or termination of this license.
 
4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY

THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THIS DISCLAIMER CONCERNS ALL FILES GENERATED AND EDITED BY FüD5 AS WELL.
 
5. CONSENT OF USE OF DATA
 
You agree that Team FüD5 may collect and use information gathered in any manner as part of the product support services provided to you, if any, related to FüD5.Team FüD5 may also use this information to provide notices to you which may be of use or interest to you.
